thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Jacqueline McCabe

author: Jacqueline McCabe
title: Jacqueline McCabe
text: Trusted Housesitters makes it easy for potential housesitters/travelers to find and make contact with homeowners who want someone to care for their home and pets while they are away. They provide a platform and verification on both ends, which makes the entire process easier and more trustworthy. Great idea for a business -- wish I'd had it first! :)
